context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The content provides instructions on when to report a missed collection, which includes putting the container out before 7am and it being after 3pm on the collection day. However, it does not explicitly state how to handle forgetting to put the bin out and reporting for a one-time pickup.
Reason.next_actions: Contact the council via the provided online service or call them for further clarification.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content provides basic instructions on when to report a missed collection, but it may not fully cater to all situations. A separate mention of how to handle forgetting to put the bin out could be included for clarity.
